06 Nov 2014 / in news / by admin

Mobile Now were recently invited to join Thoughtful China‚Äôs show covering one of the current hot topics in the mobile industry. The show covers in depth some of the challenges faced by brands, as well as assessing the best way for them to leverage the gaming space to engage consumers.

Dove launches first ever mobile engagement initiative ‚Äì Dove Go Play

15 Sep 2014 / in news / by admin

Dove Go Play allows on the go users to easily snap pictures of their hairstyle, via their phones and upload it immediately to the responsive site.

The campaign site delivers dynamic, daily content covering tutorials on how to create the model‚Äôs hairstyle of that day, as well as complementary Dove hair care tips.

Dove Go Play helps educate users, encouraging them to learn to play with their hair in any way they want, whilst still keeping their locks in tip top condition.

Everyday, ten lucky users are selected that manage to style their hair closest to the model; with one overall winner featured in the December 2014 issue of Marie Claire.

Flex your fingers with Fanta FunTap and let the tapping begin. Tap! Tap! Tap!

22 Aug 2014 / in news / by admin

Fanta was seeking to raise brand awareness of their three main flavours amongst it‚Äôs mass target audience around AP.

An addictive game concept was concepted and created, challenging players to catch falling fruit, bubbles and Fanta characters by tapping the Fanta bottles and racking up points.

Players choose from three Fanta flavours; Orange, Strawberry and Grape, each with it‚Äôs own unique gameplay, representing the distinct character of each flavour.

Sharing the Datou Datou love

22 Aug 2014 / in news / by admin

After two years and more than two million downloads, the chart topping, photo sharing app Datou Datou is now available in English.

Now all the fun features of creating photo collages and funny gifs, as well as applying cool filters are available to a wider audience around the world.
